definition: clique/school/group/faction/to dispatch/to send/to assign/to appoint/pi (Greek letter Ππ)/the circular ratio pi = 3.1415926/(loanword) pie

sentences.english: I will harden the hearts of the Egyptians so that they will go in after them.
sentences.chinese: 我要再一次叫法老的心刚硬，使他派兵追赶你们。

sentences.english: In 1807 he sent an army to conquer Spain.
Even those Chinese who think we should continue to keep a low profile did not oppose sending military forces to Libya.
sentences.chinese: 即使那些坚持韬光养晦政策的中国人也不反对派兵。

sentences.english: The teams are likely to include Green Berets, U. S. Army commandos who specialize in advising foreign troops.
sentences.chinese: 特种部队包括绿色贝雷部队，专用于辅助海外派兵。

sentences.english: Road-blocks and soldiers around power stations cannot prevent digital terrorism.
sentences.chinese: 拦截道路，派兵把守电站都不能防止数字化恐怖主义。

sentences.english: He sent others to fight the Confederates blocking the road to the nearest Union supply center.
sentences.chinese: 另派兵阻敌，保护最近处的北军供应中心。

sentences.english: He urged Mexico to send troops to occupy Texas.
sentences.chinese: 他劝墨西哥政府派兵占领德克萨斯。

sentences.english: He decided to send troops to the front.
But the Deputy Chief of Staff also said Iran will not directly send troops to Iraq.
sentences.chinese: 但副参谋长也称伊朗不会直接派兵援助伊拉克。

sentences.english: I was praying to the Lord last night, and he told me thatthere were going to be captains sent by the King.
sentences.chinese: 昨晚当我向上帝做祷告时，上帝说国王将派兵来抓我。

sentences.english: A public outcry in Thailand caused both governments to send troops to the area.
sentences.chinese: 由于泰国民情激愤，两国政府都派兵驻守该地区。

sentences.english: At a later date the Amazons came to lay attack on Athens on the excuse of recovering their queen.
sentences.chinese: 后来，亚马孙族人借口要夺回王后派兵攻打雅典。

sentences.english: Cambodia hopes the UN will send troops to the border area.
sentences.chinese: 柬埔寨方面提出希联合国向柬泰边境地区派兵。

definition: to dispatch an army/to send troops
to reinforce/to increase troop numbers/reinforcements/extra troops
to put down a revolt/to pacify a rebellion
to go on a punitive expedition
